title: Was ‘Joanie Loves Chachi’ the Highest-Rated TV Show Ever in Korea?
subtitle: Rumor holds that the 1980s sitcom 'Joanie Loves Chachi' garnered tremendous ratings in Korea due to an inadvertent language issue.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The 1980s sitcom 'Joanie Loves Chachi' garnered tremendous ratings in Korea due to an inadvertent language issue.
